properties.entry: INSERT INTO CART ( CART_NO , CART_USER , CART_PRO , CART_COUNT , CART_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ONO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT order_date , order_no , user_name , user_id , tb_order.phone phone , tb_order.address address , pro_cate_code , pro_midd_no , pro_no , pro_name , order_detail.count count , deli_status FROM order_detail left JOIN tb_order USING (order_no) left JOIN product USING (pro_no) left JOIN member USING (user_no)
